system.availability: Special synthesised Tyranid pheremone that can be applied to Sealed Armour. When it is applied, for the next 1d10+10 hours afffected characters are effectivly "invisible" to all non Synapse Tyranid Creatures as long as they are further than 2 x Perception Bonus metres away from the Tyranid creature and do not make offensive actions against them. The presence of a Synapse Creature or violating the prior restrictions allows the Tyranids to make an Awareness Test (synapse creature has +20), if succeeded the Tyranidsbecome hostile.
system.cost: Pheremone are Unique to a specific Hive Fleet. Item is usually provided if needed.
